job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to tasks associated with preparing and understanding data, which are core components of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Specialisatie in: Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Generative AI (LLM)
job_tasks.justification: The phrase explicitly mentions specialization in Deep Learning, Computer Vision, and Generative AI (LLM), which are all areas of model development.
While not directly modeling, AI Ethics & Security are crucial considerations during the development and deployment of AI models, often integrated into the modeling process.
This is a direct mention of MLOps, which falls under operations engineering for AI/ML systems.
DevOps principles and version control are foundational to operations engineering, especially in managing code and deployments.
CI/CD pipelines, along with Docker, Kubernetes, and Linux, are key tools and practices for operations engineering.
Cloud and platform engineering involves building and maintaining the infrastructure and services that AI systems run on, which is a form of software development for deployment.
The core verbs 'design, develop, and maintain' are fundamental to software development lifecycles.

classification.rationale: The job description explicitly mentions specialization in 'Generative AI (LLM)', along with core responsibilities like designing, developing, and maintaining AI systems. It also highlights building expertise in areas like LLMs, which are central to the GenAI Engineer profile.
